description:
Following Kenshin`s defeat of the giant Senkaku, Shishio pits him against the young, emotionless assassin responsible for the Home Minister`s murder.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shougeki! Oreta Sakabatou: Tenken no Soujirou tai Kenshin
Şok! Ters Tarafı Keskin Kılıç Kırıldı: Sojiro`nun Ruhu ile Kenshin Karşılaşıyor
การประลองระหว่างเคนชินกับดาบสวรรค์เซอจิโร ดาบสลับคมหัก
衝撃! 折れた逆刃刀・天剣の宗次郎対剣心
